effect.sword-shield: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.legends-arceus: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.

short_effect.sword-shield: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.legends-arceus: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
